dt: {bc}the state of doing well especially in respect to good fortune, happiness, well-being, or prosperity

dt.t: must look out for your own {wi}welfare{/wi}

dt: {bc}aid in the form of money or necessities for those in need
{bc}an agency or program through which such aid is distributed

et: Middle English, from the phrase {it}wel faren{/it} to fare well
shortdef: the state of doing well especially in respect to good fortune, happiness, well-being, or prosperity
aid in the form of money or necessities for those in need
an agency or program through which such aid is distributed

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or concerned with welfare and especially with improvement of the welfare of disadvantaged social groups

shortdef: of, relating to, or concerned with welfare and especially with improvement of the welfare of disadvantaged social groups

dt: {bc}a social system based on the assumption by a political state of primary responsibility for the individual and social welfare of its citizens
{bc}a nation or state characterized by the operation of the welfare state system

shortdef: a social system based on the assumption by a political state of primary responsibility for the individual and social welfare of its citizens
a nation or state characterized by the operation of the welfare state system
a family that receives government assistance

dt: {bc}opposed to or hostile toward government {d_link|welfare|welfare:1} programs

shortdef: opposed to or hostile toward government welfare programs

dt: {bc}organized public or private social services for the assistance of disadvantaged groups

shortdef: organized public or private social services for the assistance of disadvantaged groups; specifically : social work

dt: {bc}money or aid given by the government to help a large company

shortdef: money or aid given by the government to help a large company

dt: {bc}receiving money from the government because of a low income or lack of income

shortdef: receiving money from the government because of a low income or lack of income

dt: island in the East River, New York City, connected to Manhattan by tramway; formerly the site of penal and later hospital facilities

shortdef: island in the East River, New York City, connected to Manhattan by tramway; formerly the site of penal and later hospital facilities
